SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.repository

Class HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.repository.HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryCustom
public class HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryImpl extends Object implements HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryCustom
Implementation of custom repository methods for managing cash account balance holdings.

This class handles the creation and maintenance of time-based cash account balance records that track all cash-affecting transactions over time. The implementation is designed to respond to transaction changes and maintain accurate balance histories for performance analysis and reporting.

Transaction Impact:

Balance holdings are automatically updated whenever transactions are added, modified, or removed, ensuring that historical balance data remains accurate for analysis.

Multi-Currency Processing:

The implementation handles currency conversion for accounts with different currencies than their portfolio or tenant base currencies, maintaining conversion references for accurate cross-currency reporting.

  • Method Details

    • createCashaccountBalanceEntireForAllTenants

      @Transactional @Modifying public void createCashaccountBalanceEntireForAllTenants()
      Description copied from interface: HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryCustom
      Creates complete cash account balance holdings for all tenants in the system.

      This method performs a full rebuild of cash account balance time-frames for every tenant. It processes all cash transactions (deposits, withdrawals, interest, fees) and creates holding periods that accurately represent balance changes over time.

      Specified by:
      createCashaccountBalanceEntireForAllTenants in interface HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryCustom

    • createCashaccountBalanceEntireByTenant

      @Transactional @Modifying public void createCashaccountBalanceEntireByTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Description copied from interface: HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryCustom
      Creates complete cash account balance holdings for a specific tenant.

      This method rebuilds all cash account balance time-frames for the specified tenant, processing all historical transactions and creating accurate holding periods. It removes existing holdings for the tenant before recalculating from scratch.

      Specified by:
      createCashaccountBalanceEntireByTenant in interface HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant identifier for which to rebuild cash account holdings

    • adjustCashaccountBalanceByIdCashaccountAndFromDate

      public void adjustCashaccountBalanceByIdCashaccountAndFromDate(Transaction transaction)
      Description copied from interface: HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryCustom
      Adjusts cash account balance holdings incrementally based on a single transaction change.

      This method provides efficient incremental updates when a transaction is added, modified, or removed. It identifies the affected time period and recalculates only the necessary holding records from that point forward, preserving earlier holdings that remain valid.

      Incremental Processing:

      The method determines the impact date from the transaction and:

      • Preserves holdings before the transaction date
      • Removes and recalculates holdings from the transaction date onward
      • Applies currency conversion using current exchange rates
      • Updates related portfolio and tenant currency calculations
      Specified by:
      adjustCashaccountBalanceByIdCashaccountAndFromDate in interface HoldCashaccountBalanceJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      transaction - the transaction that triggered the balance adjustment
